meaningMnemonic: You <kanji>resent</kanji> someone so much that you <kanji>sigh</kanji> with <vocabulary>anger</vocabulary> whenever they're around. Everything they do makes you feel really strong <vocabulary>resentment</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
